name: bom
description: ```js {    "components": "tessel-v2-parts.csv" // file with part #s and prices   , "bom": "../tessel-v2.csv" // file with new tessel bom   // order to match items in. {components_header: bom_header}   // ex: items will first be matched by part # then value   , "match": [     {"Manufacturer Part #": "Designation"}      , {"Value": "Designation"}   ]   // replace the ref des & qty with the designator header in tessel-v2.csv   , "replace": {"Ref Des": "Designator",     "Qty": "Quantity",   }   // order we want bom components to appear. DNP is always last   , "order": ["U", "A", "X", "D", "L", "J", "R", "C"] } ```
